subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Angel McCoughtry had 15 points and No. 20 Louisville’s substitutes dominated their counterparts in a 68-54 victory against St. John’s Saturday in a Big East tournament first-round game.
snippet: Angel McCoughtry had 15 points and No. 20 Louisville’s substitutes dominated their counterparts in a 68-54 victory against St. John’s Saturday in a Big East tournament first-round game.
